usage: Used for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and general home or gym workouts to improve muscle mass, endurance, and overall fitness.
key_features: Product Variant: Contains 4 kg pack of 2 in bold red
Made in India: Proudly manufactured in India
Neoprene coating with smooth, anti-slip finish for comfortable and secure grip
Hexagonal design prevents rolling and provides stable placement
Ideal for strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, and home workouts
Durable and easy to wipe clean after use
Compact, vibrant colors and sleek, visually appealing design
Helps burn calories by raising heart rate
Helps increase bone density and decrease risk of fracture
ai_description: Set of compact hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-style coating. The main set is bright red, each end clearly marked “KAKSS 4 KG” in white. A lifestyle image shows a purple KAKSS dumbbell in use beside a clean infographic of exercise benefits.
target_audience: Home and gym users at all fitness levels looking for compact, coated dumbbells for strength training, toning, and general exercise.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (4kg pack of 2, Red)
